name: Adventures of Bruce
description:
This is a fantasy-themed match 3 / jigsaw puzzle mashup.

Players that like match 3 blast games, may enjoy a different take on match 3. You are not just collecting, but also trying to solve for a pretty pattern.

It has input accessibility and difficulty settings which can make the experience not just accessible, but quite therapeutic (the easiest setting). This game can be played with keyboard only, or game-pad only (2 button mode supported), or of course with touch or mouse.

Breaking up the levels is a story about Bruce and his lackluster adventures.

It also has a built-in traditional match 3 level designer and a non-random one.
